verses.text_ar: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ حِينٌ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًٔا مَّذْكُورًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: Hath there come upon man (ever) any period of time in which he was a thing unremembered?

verses.text_ar: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! We create man from a drop of thickened fluid to test him; so We make him hearing, knowing.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! We have shown him the way, whether he be grateful or disbelieving.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ سَلَـٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَـٰلًا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! We have prepared for disbelievers manacles and carcans and a raging fire.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! the righteous shall drink of a cup whereof the mixture is of Kafur,

verses.text_ar: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: A spring wherefrom the slaves of Allah drink, making it gush forth abundantly,

verses.text_ar: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: (Because) they perform the vow and fear a day whereof the evil is wide-spreading,

verses.text_ar: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: And feed with food the needy wretch, the orphan and the prisoner, for love of Him,

verses.text_ar: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: (Saying): We feed you, for the sake of Allah only. We wish for no reward nor thanks from you;

verses.text_ar: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! we fear from our Lord a day of frowning and of fate.

verses.text_ar: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: Therefor Allah hath warded off from them the evil of that day, and hath made them find brightness and joy;

verses.text_ar: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: And hath awarded them for all that they endured, a Garden and silk attire;

verses.text_ar: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: Reclining therein upon couches, they will find there neither (heat of) a sun nor bitter cold.

verses.text_ar: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَـٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: The shade thereof is close upon them and the clustered fruits thereof bow down.

verses.text_ar: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠
verses.text_en_pickthall: Goblets of silver are brought round for them, and beakers (as) of glass

verses.text_ar: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: (Bright as) glass but (made) of silver, which they (themselves) have measured to the measure (of their deeds).

verses.text_ar: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: There are they watered with a cup whereof the mixture is of Zanjabil,

verses.text_ar: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: (The water of) a spring therein, named Salsabil.

verses.text_ar: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: There wait on them immortal youths, whom, when thou seest, thou wouldst take for scattered pearls.

verses.text_ar: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: When thou seest, thou wilt see there bliss and high estate.

verses.text_ar: عَـٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: Their raiment will be fine green silk and gold embroidery. Bracelets of silver will they wear. Their Lord will slake their thirst with a pure drink.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: (And it will be said unto them): Lo! this is a reward for you. Your endeavour (upon earth) hath found acceptance.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! We, even We, have revealed unto thee the Qur´an, a revelation;

verses.text_ar: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: So submit patiently to thy Lord´s command, and obey not of them any guilty one or disbeliever.

verses.text_ar: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: Remember the name of thy Lord at morn and evening.

verses.text_ar: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: And worship Him (a portion) of the night. And glorify Him through the livelong night.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! these love fleeting life, and put behind them (the remembrance of) a grievous day.

verses.text_ar: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: We, even We, created them, and strengthened their frame. And when We will, We can replace them, bringing others like them in their stead.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! this is an Admonishment, that whosoever will may choose a way unto his Lord.

verses.text_ar: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: Yet ye will not, unless Allah willeth. Lo! Allah is Knower, Wise.

verses.text_ar: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا
verses.text_en_pickthall: He maketh whom He will to enter His mercy, and for evil-doers hath prepared a painful doom.
